title: Free Wi-Fi, Indoor Swimming Pool, Generous Resident Referral Program
posting_body: ['Solaire is a smoke-free, luxury apartment community for seniors 62 years of age and better who prefer a serene lifestyle.', 'We have studios, one, two and three bedroom apartments with spacious closets, carpeted floors, balconies, and patios.', 'Solaire is a welcoming community with on-site beauty salon, library, community center, weekly activities, sauna, fitness center, pool, laundry, and much more.', 'Don’t miss your chance to enjoy peaceful living at Solaire, call today!', '-Cash Payments Accepted At Select Retailers', '-Assigned Parking', '-Package Acceptance', '-New/Renovated Interior', '-Easy Access to Interstates', '-Online Payment Options (Credit Card, Debit Card and ACH)', '-Weekly Activities', '-Fitness Center', '-Walk-In Closets', '-Laundry Facility', '-Smoke Free', '-Library', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
